definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="hotbarSlot">hotbarSlot</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_ticks</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="logic_variable"><field name="variable">force_one_slot</field><field name="config">CUSTOM:MainConfig</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">LocalPlayer player = Minecraft.getInstance().player;&#10;        if (player == null) return;</field><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:hotbarSlot</field><value name="VAL"><block type="java_code_get"><field name="CODE">player.getInventory().getSelectedSlot();</field></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:hotbarSlot</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">4</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">player.getInventory().setSelectedSlot(4);</field></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
